resources.string: All ads will be removed with your first purchase!
Try to finish the level before it gets dark. The longer you take the darker it gets
Try to finish the level with less steps. The deeper you go the darker it gets
The ground is slippery. You can\'t change direction until the path ends
Every few steps you\'ll lose your orientation. The map will rotate randomly
Stars will help you on your way. You\'ll find 3 of them in each level
Finding a fireplace will help you survive longer as it resets the darkness completely
A portal takes you to unreachable places
When you face a monster make sure you have found a sword first in order to survive
A sword will help you fighting monsters along the path
While the trap is active you will die when trying to cross it
The trap is temporarily inactive. You can safely pass it but be quick
The ground is fragile. It will only last for one more step before breaking
The ground has collapsed. When you try to cross it you will die
If I just had a torch…

You find yourself lost in a terrifying maze. You need to get back home before sunset. Move around by swiping or change the input mode to touch at the bottom of the screen. At each stage you will find 3 stars that will help you to proceed later on. Good luck!
Oh no a monster is blocking your path. You must find a sword first in order to proceed
Look, there\'s a portal somewhere. You have to find it. It will take you to unreachable places
You entered a grand cave. The deeper you go the darker it gets. So watch your steps and try to find a fireplace
It got cold. The path is frozen and slippery. Watch out
You entered a wide desert. Try not to lose your orientation and watch out for sandstorms
Do you really want to reset level?
Do you like to reveal the map? 20 Stars
Do you really want to go back to the level select screen? You will lose all your progress in the current level
You already are at full health
There was an error, please try again
